Text:
No trailers, fbi/other warnings, ads, previews, bonus features cut it all out.
Just the movie pure untouched, and flawless just like the original.
No Spanish or French 5.1, only English 5.1.
English and Spanish Subtitles is in there.
No menu for those that may have wanted one...sorry.
My info above never said anything about a menu, or else I would have posted that for sure.

If you're still not satisfied, I shall suggest rent/buy it.
This will be my last post.
Enjoy:)

Hi TPB friends(swetspe), http:/xxxfreetubes3.tk is garbage.
Please post links that do not lead to spy-ware, or ad-ware.
Thank you.
What setting in Nero 8 do i use to burn Video TS?

Use Nero Express.
Choose Videos/Pictures>DVD-Video Files
Add Fast_and_Furious_2009, and walaa
Settings choose DVD 5 (4483MB)
Click Next
Choose recorder (which drive you use need blank *prefer*DVD-R or DVD+R)
change disc name, and burn away@writing speed 8x
Enjoy:)
